components.label: HTML
components.content: {{data.designationStatus === 'Approved' ? 'Outline the reasoning for accepting this designation. The notes will be added to the institution profile.' : 'Outline the reasoning for declining this designation. The notes will be added to the institution profile.'}}

validate.custom: valid=(data.startDate) ? (data.startDate<data.endDate) ? true : 'Expiry Date must be after Start Date' : 'Please provide Start date';

validate.customMessage: Please select at least one location
